description:
gc: Switch related errors should use plain format.

Fixes issue 2422.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

Please rewrite those two %+N to %lN, not %N.
I suspect they were simply missed in the format sweep,
and it is useful to see the type in the error.

Russ

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=568ffed67598 ***

gc: Switch related errors should use plain format.

Fixes issue 2422.
